content.rendered:
An article by Linda S. Morris of the Macon Telegraph

“Initially, the goal for Shane Gottwals and his wife, Abbey, was to have a small business she could operate near their Warner Robins home, so she wouldn’t have to commute so far to work.

They settled on a used book store, at first selling and trading mostly Christian books. The couple opened a 1,500-square-foot Gottwals Books store in Warner Robins in 2007. Shane Gottwals continued his teaching job at Central Fellowship Christian Academy.”

Read full article

Educational Wooden Toys from Melissa and Doug

Melissa and Doug’s toys are durable, colorful, and educational! And each toy can be interacted with on multiple levels. Not only can you use the letters from the See & Spell Learning Toy to spell and work on sight words, but you can stencil the letters for other fun games all the while encouraging motor skill development. This and many more options available at your local Gottwals Books!

Endless Reading Opportunities

We have a spectacular and seemingly endless selection of children’s books. Instill the love of reading early!

excerpt.rendered: Read the exciting story behind Gottwals Books and how Shane and Abbey Gottwals trusted the Lord to take care of them even during slow beginnings. Today, Gottwals has his sights set on quickly growing the business – perhaps as many as five new franchise locations this year.
